localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: 1Password for Linux brings the uncompromising security and award-winning design of 1Password to Linux.
nodes.title: 1Password for Linux - The worldâ€™s most loved password manager is now on Linux
nodes.author: Ricardo D. Flores

nodes.excerpt: We built an AI writing assistant that surfaces useful information as you type. Get started with a 7-day free trial.
nodes.title: bundleIQ - Grammarly for knowledge
nodes.author: Jeff Weisbein

nodes.excerpt: lockrMail is a free productivity tool that acts as a pre-filter for your inbox, providing you with a unique and secure email address to use online. Custom filters enable you to decide which brand emails come to your inbox and which are blocked.
nodes.title: lockrMail - Own the power to organize and protect your email inbox
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Forma was born of the realisation that all business processes essentially are workflows with a few triggers, conditions, and outcomes. We are a platform that help you create workflows for any of your business processes, and empower your non-technical staff to be able to do it, with a simple, no-code approach.
nodes.title: Forma - No-Code platform to build customised worfklows
nodes.author: Elston Yee

nodes.excerpt: Do your users take your website for granted? Do want to make using your website living hell? Just add the script and get started! Oh yeah, FYU stands for something ğŸ‘€.
nodes.title: F*ck Your Users - Make using your website a living hell
nodes.author: Piero Maddaleni

nodes.excerpt: It is tiring to save contacts all the time, Whatsapp already has a feature to chat without saving, but it is a hassle to write it. So I created a helper website to solve that problem. The country code will be saved in localStorage.
nodes.title: WhatsApp Helper - A WhatsApp helper to avoid saving number to your contacts
nodes.author: Theodorus Clarence

nodes.excerpt: The power of voice access makes games more accessible and inclusive. Currently you can use Fridai for voice control over supported games and access GPT-3 powered guides and walkthroughs from within the game, so you can immerse yourself in gaming.
nodes.title: Fridai - GPT-3 powered guides & control to make games more accessible
nodes.author: Mark Engelhardt

nodes.excerpt: Quod AI's Chrome extension helps software developers resolve issues smarter. See instant search suggestions for code and more from your Github or Jira issues. Powered by AI.
nodes.title: Quod AI for Github & Jira issues - 1-click search for code & context from Github/Jira issues
nodes.author: Ravi Sethia

nodes.excerpt: Open-source team collaboration tool with unique topic-based threading that combines the best of email and chat to make remote work productive and delightful. Fortune 500 companies, leading open source projects, and 1000s of other organizations use Zulip.
nodes.title: Zulip 4.0 - Open source team chat with powerful threading
nodes.author: Tim Abbott

nodes.excerpt: teza.ai analyzes public articles, tweets, videos and more, to help you: ğŸ”¹ do days of research in seconds ğŸ”¹ find common ground ğŸ”¹ personalize your pitch to investors ğŸ”¹ be brilliant in every meeting
nodes.title: Teza - AI-generated briefs on investors and thought-leaders

nodes.title: Nototo - The spatial workspace - organize everything on one canvas
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Crely is a Work Management platform with your favorite integrations & automations. No more repetitive manual work - save time and costs. Collaborate effectively using process checklists and templates. Built for remote teams.
nodes.title: Crely No-code Work Automation - No-code Process Management for Business Users
nodes.author: Abhi Onkar

nodes.excerpt: Easily download and/or remove Gmail attachments from many emails at once. Works on Windows, macOS and Ubuntu. Privacy, satisfaction, and money-back guarantee.
nodes.title: Unattach - Free up your Google storage by removing Gmail attachments

nodes.title: Globe 3D - Convert your design into an interactive 3D globe

nodes.excerpt: A Python package to copy all your Kindle highlights and notes to a database in Notion. Plug in your Kindle device to your PC to run this script. Requires Python 3.9+ installed on your system.
nodes.title: Kindle2Notion - Export your Kindle clippings to a Notion database
nodes.author: Jeffrey Jacob

nodes.excerpt: Skip spending hundreds of dollars on overpriced Notion courses. Get a free Notion template that teaches all of Notion in one page. Vetted by 1500+ Notion subscribers and 750 Reddit upvotes, this template has helped hundreds skip the Notion learning curve.
nodes.title: The Ultimate Notionpedia - A free template to learn Notion on 1 page
nodes.author: Alex Madrzyk

nodes.excerpt: Notion Travel Planner Template. Travelo helps you to turn your travel bucketlist into a bulletproof action plan and help you manage your adventures in one workspace.
nodes.title: Travelo - Plan your next trip with this Notion template
nodes.author: Deepak Yadav

nodes.excerpt: Tell stories using these 217 creative doodle illustrations with beautiful colors and artistic brush strokes that will certainly bring life to your projects and keep your users entertained. ğŸ”¥ Part of our 6000+ illustrations bundle + Free updates
nodes.title: Simple illustrations - Awesome vector illustrations for your next project
nodes.author: Ramy Wafaa

nodes.excerpt: Circular Docs takes a folder of Google Docs and creates a knowledge base. Perfect for anyone using Google Docs that wants to publish collections of content to the web. New changes are published automatically so the site is always up to date.
nodes.title: Circular Docs - Create a knowledge base with your Google Drive content
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Now Sheet Monkey lets you send your forms directly to Notion Databases. It's perfect for Webflow, Carrd, static HTML sites. It eliminates the need for backend code and takes seconds to get started.
nodes.title: Sheet Monkey for Notion - Connect your forms to Notion
nodes.author: Levi Nunnink

nodes.excerpt: Post uploader for Instagramâ„¢ï¸. Upload photos and videos to Instagram. Support uploading in the next formats - MP4, MOV, JPEG, JPG, PNG, SVG, GIF on Instagram from PC. Upload post with visual image effects or filters, caption and location.
nodes.title: Post Uploader for Instagram - Upload post on Instagram from PC. Post photos and videos!

nodes.excerpt: Open up your Notion workspace to your favorite apps and take your productivity to the moon. With n8n's Notion node, you will be able to sync data between Notion and other apps. While you are at it, why not build your own products with Notion and n8n?
nodes.title: Notion n8n Integration - Connect your Notion workspace to your favorite apps
nodes.author: Jan Oberhauser

nodes.excerpt: FromNotion lets you build one-page sites on Notion, whether it's a personal website, a landing page, or something more elaborate. It's simple, responsive, and no code skills required.
nodes.title: FromNotion - Beautiful one-page sites on Notion in minutes
nodes.author: Alexey Shashkov

nodes.excerpt: Building remote teams requires trust, async collaboration, remote support and an understanding of context and culture for other team members. We are the first remote jobs platform to make these a key part of the conversation between candidates and employers.
nodes.title: Remotely - Find where you want to work based on time, location and team
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock
